sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>scooter</radical> with a <radical>mohawk</radical>, now that's the most <kanji>suitable</kanji> hairstyle you could ever think of for a scooter!
meaningInfo: You keep seeing scooters all over the city with mohawks and you can't get it out of your head that it's the most suitable thing you've ever seen.
readingMnemonic: You want this <kanji>suitable</kanji> hairstyle for your scooter too, and luckily you're a <reading>techie</reading> (<ja>てき</ja>), so it's easy for you to install one.
readingInfo: Imagine going online to check out some of your techie message boards and learning the most suitable mohawk for your scooter then installing it yourself.
